attributes.review: This app is the worst app to ever be added to the Apple store .i can’t believe this app actually has 2 stars. It deserves ZERO .donald trump has made America a living HELL .and he looks like a Cheeto dipped in cheese .and he is fat and wears a WIG.i want Obama back or I’m moving to CANADA .donald Trump I hope you read this just so you know I don’t like you at allllllll 🖕🏿🖕🏾🖕🏽.and black lives matter ✊🏾
attributes.title: F*ck Cheeto Trump

attributes.review: I saw a review on the app talking about trump ninjas coming to there house and chanting “RATE THE TRUMP APP FIVE STARS” over and over again. I didn’t think much of it. But when I downloaded it, IM NOT EVEN JOKING IT TOOK THREE HUNDRED YEARS TO DOWNLOAD. So of corse I was going to leave a bad review. But all of a sudden the 🍊🍊 ninjas came out of nowhere and started to attack me. But luckily for me I watched several trump ninja fighting corses on YouTube. I took them all down and started writing again. I thought every thing was fine but no, I thought wrong. The birds (that work for the bourgeoisie) saw that I took down the 🍊 ninjas so they told the king orange that I was going rate it one star. Obviously he couldn’t let me do that because this app might get taken down from the App Store. I was sitting on my couch when all of a sudden the orange himself busted through the front door and threw my phone on the floor so hard that it broke. And then he left. What should I do? I thought. But I realized I still had my galaxy s4 tablet from 2018 underneath my bed. I took it out and searched far. It died very quickly so while I charged it I realized that I don’t have enough time to write a large paragraph on how you should get this app so I came to a conclusion that I should just buy a new phone. I bought the iPhone 8 and installed this app and waited another 300 years just so I get write this review so please give this a one star review if you are seeing this. Thank you 🧡
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP 🍊🍊🍊

attributes.title: Horrible

Of course ✨✨ Mr.Trompe 😌😌 knows that 🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️. The vibrations 🔊🔊🔊 started making my heart 💜 EXPLODE 🤯🤯🤯 I’ve now been given a sheep 🐑 heart ❤️ and am being kept alive by the vibrations 🔊🔊🔊 of the song 🎵🎵 Africa by Toto 🎵🎵🎵🎵Do not download this app I have a sheep heart because of it!!!! 🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️💫😌💫💫🐸🐸👑👑🤯😱😨😨💜💜
